obfuscation: Do n't be alarmed-- it 's not serious; yet it is arranged this until it is decided which of america two 's actual King our own serves are to act as one person; and exactly; and now though we act as one person our own serves be inside point of fact two persons.
original: Don't be alarmed--it's not serious. It is arranged   that, until it is decided which of us two is the actual King, we   are to act as one person. Exactly. Now, although we act as one person, we are, in point of fact, two persons.

obfuscation: Ah I do not believe our own serves can go into this, as it 's a legal fiction also legal factions are solemn things; situated as our own serves be we ca not recognize two independent responsibility, as no but you can recognize two independent appetite.
original: Ah, I don't think we can go into that. It is a   legal fiction, and legal fictions are solemn things. Situated as   we are, we can't recognize two independent responsibilities. No; but you can recognize two independent appetites.

obfuscation: It 's all very well to say we law as one individual but when you supply america along only one ration 'tween us I will describe it as legal fiction carried a small too far; and it 's rather nice point.
original: It's all very well to say we act as one person, but when you   supply us with only one ration between us, I should describe it   as a legal fiction carried a little too far. It's rather a nice point.

obfuscation: I do not like to express opinion off-hand; suppose our own serves reserve it for argument prior to full Court; and yes but what be we to do in meantime; our own serves want our tea.
original: I don't like to express an   opinion off-hand. Suppose we reserve it for argument before the   full Court? Yes, but what are we to do in the meantime? We want our tea.

obfuscation: I believe we may issue an interim order for double rations on their Majesties entering into the usual undertaking to indemnify inside case inside adverse decision; this myself think will meet the cases; and but you must work hard-- stick to it-- nothing like work; yet oh certainly.
original: I think we may make an interim order for double   rations on their Majesties entering into the usual undertaking to   indemnify in the event of an adverse decision? That, I think, will meet the case. But you must work   hard--stick to it--nothing like work. Oh, certainly.

obfuscation: We quite understand this man which holds magnificent position of King should so fix it to warrant it.
original: We quite understand that a man who   holds the magnificent position of King should do something to   justify it.

obfuscation: our own serves are called`` Your Majesty'' we be authorized to buy ourselves magnificent clothes our subjects frequently nod to us in the streets entries still return our salute also our own serves enjoy estimable privilege of heading subscription lists to all main charities.
original: We are called "Your Majesty"; we are allowed to buy   ourselves magnificent clothes; our subjects frequently nod to us   in the streets; the sentries always return our salutes; and we   enjoy the inestimable privilege of heading the subscription lists   to all the principal charities.

obfuscation: In return for these benefits least we can do be to make ourselves useful about Palace; rising early inside the morning our own serves proceed to light the fire Then our Majesty adorning inside its workaday attire We embark without delay On duties of day.
original: In return for these advantages   the least we can do is to make ourselves useful about the Palace. Rising early in the morning,  We proceed to light the fire,   Then our Majesty adorning        In its workaday attire,             We embark without delay             On the duties of the day.

obfuscation: First we polish off certain patches Of political dispatches also foreign politicians circumvented Then assuming that business is not heavy our own serves may hold a Royal levee Or ratify certain Acts in Parliament, and then we probably consideration the household troops-- along the usual`` shallow lumps!'' and`` shallow hoofs!'' Like, or receive along ceremonial also status interesting Eastern potentates.
original: First, we polish off some batches   Of political despatches,        And foreign politicians circumvent;   Then, if business isn't heavy,   We may hold a Royal levee,        Or ratify some Acts of Parliament. Then we probably review the household troops--        With the usual "Shalloo humps!" and "Shalloo hoops!" Or receive with ceremonial and state   An interesting Eastern potentate.
